source.61e9b419:
# 1
import random
import math
list = []
for i in range(100):
    list.append(math.floor(random.random()*1000000)/1000000)

# graph
%matplotlib inline
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# draw graph
plt.plot(list)

# 2
for i in range(len(list)):
    for j in range(len(list)-i):
        if list[i]>list[j+i]:
            save=list[j+i]
            list[j+i]=list[i]
            list[i]=save

# draw sorted graph
plt.plot(list)
